name: The Flying Luttenbachers
description: '''The Flying Luttenbachers''' are an American [[instrumental music|instrumental]] [[noise rock]] band led by [[multi-instrumentalist]], [[composer]] and [[Record producer|producer]] [[Weasel Walter]]. The band's mix of styles such as [[Punk rock|punk]], [[death metal]], [[free jazz]], and [[no wave]] inspired the "[[brutal prog]]" genre in the early 2000s.
